abstract: Even as the market remains wobbly and the economy weak, Frederick R. Adler is optimistic about the country’s prospects.
snippet: Even as the market remains wobbly and the economy weak, Frederick R. Adler is optimistic about the country’s prospects.
lead_paragraph: Even as the market remains wobbly and the economy weak, Frederick R. Adler, the venture capitalist pioneer, is optimistic about the country’s prospects.

headline.main: Venture Capitalist Pioneer Talks Taxes, Tech and Facebook
